mapper.select: SELECT m.email_id AS emailId, m.email_title AS emailTitle, m.email_content AS emailContent, m.sent_date AS sentDate, m.sender_emp_id AS senderEmpId, e.emp_name AS senderEmpName, r.receiver_emp_id AS receiverEmpId, e2.emp_name AS receiverEmpName FROM tbl_mail m JOIN employee e ON m.sender_emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN tbl_mail_receivers r ON m.email_id = r.email_id JOIN employee e2 ON r.receiver_emp_id = e2.emp_id WHERE m.sender_emp_id = #{senderEmpId}

SELECT m.email_id AS emailId, m.email_title AS emailTitle, m.email_content AS emailContent, m.sent_date AS sentDate, m.sender_emp_id AS senderEmpId, e1.emp_name AS senderEmpName, r.receiver_emp_id AS receiverEmpId, e2.emp_name AS receiverEmpName FROM tbl_mail_receivers r JOIN tbl_mail m ON r.email_id = m.email_id JOIN employee e1 ON m.sender_emp_id = e1.emp_id JOIN employee e2 ON r.receiver_emp_id = e2.emp_id WHERE r.receiver_emp_id = #{receiverEmpId} AND r.trash_status = false

SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_name, e.emp_no, e.emp_address, e.emp_email, e.emp_joined, e.annual_leave, e.emp_pwd, e.profile, e.emp_phone, e.dept_code, e.position_value, e.view_auth, d.dept_name AS deptName, -- AS를 사용하여 필드 이름을 DTO 와 일치시킴 p.position_name AS positionName -- AS를 사용하여 필드 이름을 DTO 와 일치시킴 FROM employee e JOIN tbl_dept d ON e.dept_code = d.dept_code JOIN tbl_position p ON e.position_value = p.position_value WHERE e.emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchReceiverInput}, '%')

SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_name, e.emp_no, e.emp_address, e.emp_email, e.emp_joined, e.annual_leave, e.emp_pwd, e.profile, e.emp_phone, e.dept_code, e.position_value, e.view_auth, d.dept_name AS deptName, -- AS를 사용하여 필드 이름을 DTO 와 일치시킴 p.position_name AS positionName -- AS를 사용하여 필드 이름을 DTO 와 일치시킴 FROM employee e JOIN tbl_dept d ON e.dept_code = d.dept_code JOIN tbl_position p ON e.position_value = p.position_value
